import MyCard from "../UI/MyCard"; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import LoadingSpinnerp from "../UI/LoadingSpinnerp"; import style from "./CardData.module.css" import { pageActions } from "../store/page-slice"; const CardData = ()=>{ const getSuccess = useSelector(state=>state.myPage.getSuccess) const cardsperRow = useSelector(state=>state.myPage.pageList) let rowNum = useSelector(state=>state.myPage.rowNum) let cardNum = useSelector(state=>state.myPage.cardNum) const dispatch = useDispatch() const rowHadler=(n)=>{ return [...Array(n)].map((e, i) =>
{cardsperRow[(0+i)].map((item)=> ) }
) } const flipCardhanler=()=>{ dispatch(pageActions.flipCardHandler()) } const onHandlerCardNum=(event)=>{ dispatch(pageActions.onHoandlerCardNum(event.target.value)) } const onHandlerRowNum=(event)=>{ dispatch(pageActions.onHandlerRowNum(event.target.value)) } return
{getSuccess ? rowHadler(rowNum) : }
} export default CardData;
